attributes.action: ignore and resist ALL calls to cap, or otherwise restrict, State benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have seen A LOT of petitions expressing anger about paying state benefits and almost envy of people who receive them; a sort-of benefits equivalent of "the politics of envy".  There can be any number of reasons for an individual to need either short-term or long-term benefits: from illness/disability to inability to get a job (and I would refute, strongly, calls for such individuals to take any job offered; in fact the stress caused by spending 35 or 40 hours a week in a particularly uncongenial job could even cause a long-term psychiatric illness which would lead to the need to pay MORE benefit).  ANYONE can find him/herself in the position of needing benefits; they're low enough, in all conscience, and I've yet to see any petition (except my own) against the FAR HIGHER cost of TAX EVASION/AVOIDANCE!
